name: the magnus throw
notes:
add some color and joy to your home with the magnus throw. this stunning, soft and lightweight throw is sure to become a favorite. the scarfie lite shines in this block stitch pattern. plus the twisted fringe means no ends to weave in! 

pattern is written in us terms.

materials:
1,520 yards (5 skeins) of lion brand scarfie lite in color a (sunset)
850 yards (5 skeins) of lion brand wool-ease in color b (arrowwood)
crochet hook size j (6mm)
tapestry needle, scissors, tape measure


size:
finished size is approx. 45”w x 60”h (not including fringe).


this pattern is also available as a kit from lion brand yarn.
